dataset: Bangladesh diarrhea analysis

washb_bangladesh_diar.Rd

Bangladesh diarrhea dataset

data(washb_bangladesh_diar)

Format

A data frame with 22,596 observations and 29 variables.

dataid

Compound ID

childid

Child ID

tchild

Target child in birth cohort

clusterid

Cluster ID)

block

Randomization block ID

tr

Treatment assignment

svy

Survey round (0,1,2)

svydate

Survey date

month

Month measurement

sex

Sex

dob

Date of birth

agedays

Age in days

ageyrs

Age in years

enrolage

Age at enrollment, years

newbirth

New birth

sibnewbirth

Sibling (non-index child) new birth

gt36mos

Older than 36 mos at enrollment

d3plus2d

3+ stools in 24 hr, 2d recall

d3plus7d

3+ stools in 24 hr, 7d recall

dloose2d

loose or watery stool, 2d recall

dloose7d

loose or watery stool, 7d recall

dblood2d

blood in stool, 2d recall

dblood7d

blood in stool, 7d recall

diar2d

Diarrhea case, 2d recall

diar7d

Diarrhea case, 7d recall

bruise2d

Bruising, 2d recall

bruise7d

Bruising, 7d recall

tooth2d

Toothache, 2d recall

tooth7d

Toothache, 7d recall

  • Format
